Form validators¶

Validators used in form builder.

form_builder.validators.float_choices(list_choices)¶

Validate if ‘value’ in all choices are of type int or not.

Parameters:list_choice – [ <fields.Choice>, <fields.Choice>, ... ]

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.int_choices(list_choices)¶

Validate if ‘value’ in all choices are of type int or not.

Parameters:list_choice – [ <fields.Choice>, <fields.Choice>, ... ]

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.min_max_validator(min_val, max_val)¶

Validates if ‘min_val’ <= ‘max_val’ :param min_val: Test value which is supposed to be smaler. :param max_val: Test value which is supposed to be greater.

Throws: AssertionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.string_choices(list_choices)¶

Validate if ‘value’ in all choices are of type string or not.

Parameters:list_choice – [ <fields.Choice>, <fields.Choice>, ... ]

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.validate_calc_fld_expression(expression)¶

Validates calculated field evaluation expression.

Parameters:expression – Expression

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidCalculatedFieldExpression

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.validate_email(email_addr)¶

Method to validate email address.

Parameters:email_addr – Email address

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldValueError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.validate_label(label)¶

Method to validate if the label name follows conventions for declaring a javascript variable.

Parameters:label – Label name

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.validate_max_score(max_score)¶

Method to check if max score is between 3 and 12 for a rating field.

Parameters:max_score – Max score

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.validators.validate_no_special_char(value)¶

Method to check that value must not contain any special characters.

Parameters:value – Value

Throws: form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldValueError

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
